name: Antoine Poinsot
cooked: Related to the topic of this thread, the Bitcoin Core wallet is about to add an RPC to backup a wallet’s descriptors and related information. See https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/32489. I’m unsure how much overlap there is with this effort, but it’s about achieving the same goal: backing up all private-but-not-secret information related to the wallet of a user.
topic_title: A simple backup scheme for wallet accounts
topic_html_title: A simple backup scheme for wallet accounts
